public class InventoryUtils
extends Object

Represents all Inventory-related utilities.

Gets the total item count of a given type and data

Author: bergerkiller

Parameters:
inventory - to look in
typeid - of the items to look for, -1 for any item
data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data

Amount of items in the inventory

Obtains an item of the given type and data in the inventory specified
If multiple items with the same type and data exist, their amounts are added together

Author: bergerkiller

Parameters:
inventory - to look in
typeId - of the items to look for, -1 for any item
data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data
Returns:
Amount of items in the inventory

containsAtLeast

public static boolean containsAtLeast(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                      org.bukkit.Material material,
                                      int minAmount)
Validates if an inventory contains at certain amount of items from the specified material.

Parameters:
inventory - The Inventory to validate
material - The material to match to
minAmount - The amount of items to validate
Returns:
If the inventory contains that amount of items.
